Commands.Flare (IV): 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Small Magical Attack Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Summon Leviathan: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Grants Small Max BRV Up to all party members for 3 turns.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Lasts while Water Enchant is active.
Commands.Weak Damage Up All: Slightly raises party Weakness damage dealt for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Summon Dragon: 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Ignores Defense.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.  Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies.  Inflicts Water Resistance Down to all enemies for 4 turns.

Passives.Flare (IV) Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Flare (IV).
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Summon Leviathan Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Summon Leviathan.
Passives.Flare (IV) Charge: Increases the max uses of Flare (IV) by 1.
Passives.Summon Leviathan Charge: Increases the max uses of Summon Leviathan by 1.
Passives.Mist's Survivor: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack, Defense and Speed if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Flare (IV) Extend: Increases the max uses of Flare (IV) by 2.When using Flare (IV):- Increases the number of BRV hits to 4.- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Extends Magical Attack Up's duration by 1 turn.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Attack while buffed.
Passives.Summon Leviathan Extend: When using Summon Leviathan:- Raises BRV based on Max BRV before the BRV hits.- Increases the number of BRV hits to 4.- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Slightly raises Max BRV Up's potency.- Extends the duration of buffs granted by 1 turn.- Triggers an AoE HP attack after use.- HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.When using BRV Attack/+:- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2.- Slightly raises its potency.
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises Initial BRV and Max BRV by 20%
Passives.Weak Damage Up All Extend: When using  Weak Damage Up , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit

Weapons.Flame Whip CP: 35: Increases the potency of Summon Leviathan and moderately raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Increases the potency and extends the duration of Max BRV Up.Grants Water Enchant to all party members.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Water Enchant is active.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Weak Damage Up All  use +1Duration of  Weak Damage Up All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Chain Whip CP: 15: Increases the potency of Flare (IV).Increases the potency of Magical Attack Up and extends its duration.
Weapons.Mystic Whip CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Summon Dragon
